snippet.title: Secret Dishes In Four New York Restaurants
snippet.description: Many restaurants have request-only, off the menu dishes. Here are several worth trying in four New York restaurants. read »

snippet.title: What Working In Wolfgang Puck's "New" Beverly Hills Restaurant Taught Me About Success
snippet.description: Celebrity chef Wolfgang Puck challenged me to work alongside him in the kitchen at Spago Beverly Hills.

snippet.title: NYC Nightlife: Cocktail Calling
snippet.description: The first month of 2012 has brought a handful of new creative cocktail joints perfect for a catching up with friends on a cold winter’s night. Here’s a run down of NYC’s newest destinations for speciality libations: The Wayland 700 East Ninth Street at Avenue C Cocktails at The Wayland in Alphabet [...] read »

snippet.description: Inside the velvet rope of the city's top private kitchens. read »

snippet.title: The Turnaround Artist
snippet.description: Over 40, with more bombs than an artillery range, Jennifer Lopez seemed washed up. Then American Idol gave her a second chance, which she's taken all the way to the top of our Celebrity 100. read »
